common_params: [{"name":"partner_id","type":"int","sample":"1","description":"Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests."},{"name":"timestamp","type":"timestamp","sample":"1610000000","description":"This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes."},{"name":"access_token","type":"string","sample":"c09222e3fc40ffb25fc947f738b1abf1","description":"The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours."},{"name":"shop_id","type":"int","sample":"600000","description":"Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for most APIs."},{"name":"sign","type":"string","sample":"e318d3e932719916a9f9ebb57e2011961bd47abfa54a36e040d050d8931596e2","description":"Signature generated by partner_id, api path, timestamp, access_token, shop_id and partner_key via HMAC-SHA256 hashing algorithm. More details: https://open.shopee.com/documents?module=87&type=2&id=58&version=2"}]
define: For given shop id and region, return warehouse info including warehouse id, address id and location id

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: The information you queried is not found.

error_list.name: warehouse.error_can_not_find_warehouse
error_list.description: This error will show if there is no legal warehouse address for given shop id

error_list.name: warehouse.error_not_in_whitelist
error_list.description: This error will show if your shop has no permission to access multi-warehouse

error_list.name: warehouse.error_region_can_not_blank
error_list.description: This error will show if region is missing.

error_list.name: warehouse.error_region_not_valid
error_list.description: This error will show if region is not in ID, PH, VN, SG, TW, MX

error_list.name: warehouse.error_shop_id_can_not_blank
error_list.description: This error will show if shop id is missing.

params:
{"request_params":[{"description":"

Type of warehouse. Applicable values: 

- 1: Pickup Warehouse

- 2: Return Warehouse


Default value is 1 (Pickup Warehouse)

","name":"warehouse_type","sample":"1","type":"int32","required":"False","key":"YwFFGFD"}],"response_params":[{"description":"

The error key if there's error.

","name":"error","sample":"warehouse.error_not_in_whitelist","type":"string","required":null,"key":"mKpSEMs"},{"description":"

Messages about the error and it's cause if there're errors. It will be just return the updated information if there's no error.

","name":"message","sample":"Your shop is not in multi-warehouse whitelist.","type":"string","required":null,"key":"eBitzJS"},{"name":"request_id","type":"string","sample":"16488d76e337c606s5504f26","description":"

The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

","key":"KwmjmZc"},{"description":"","name":"response","sample":"","type":"object[]","required":null,"key":"DYHhZPk","children":[{"description":"

Warehouse address identifier. It should be unique for every warehouse address

","name":"warehouse_id","sample":"6","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"xcxXrkH"},{"description":"

The warehouse name filled in when creating the warehouse address

","name":"warehouse_name","sample":"warehouse1","type":"string","required":null,"key":"NnkEenw"},{"description":"

Type of warehouse. Applicable values: 

- 1: Pickup Warehouse

- 2: Return Warehouse

","name":"warehouse_type","sample":"1","type":"int32","required":null,"key":"tyHEBhf"},{"description":"

Location identifier for stocks. Different location_ids represent that your addresses are in different item stocks

","name":"location_id","sample":"IDZ","type":"string","required":null,"key":"wfWsCWJ"},{"description":"

Identity of address

","name":"address_id","sample":"118454205","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"PYPNaSJ"},{"description":"

Region of your warehouse address

","name":"region","sample":"ID","type":"string","required":null,"key":"MQheetY"},{"description":"

State of your warehouse address

","name":"state","sample":"ACEH","type":"string","required":null,"key":"iiCDfcR"},{"description":"

City of your warehouse address

","name":"city","sample":"KAB. ACEH UTARA","type":"string","required":null,"key":"JpsNNSC"},{"description":"

Detail address of your warehouse address

","name":"address","sample":"Parque Sagrada Família","type":"string","required":null,"key":"bcXTiYR"},{"description":"

Zipcode of your warehouse address

","name":"zipcode","sample":"24379","type":"string","required":null,"key":"GzzBiQp"},{"description":"

Distinct of your warehouse address

","name":"district","sample":"Mato Grosso","type":"string","required":null,"key":"NYaFifa"},{"description":"

Town of your warehouse address

","name":"town","sample":"Av Maria H A dos Santos","type":"string","required":null,"key":"mYaifkD"},{"description":"

State code of your warehouse address

","name":"state_code","sample":"12345","type":"string","required":null,"key":"GDhajjm"},{"description":"

The holiday mode state of your address.
0: not in holiday mode

1: holiday mode active

2: holiday mode is turning of

3: holiday mode is turning on

","name":"holiday_mode_state","sample":"0","type":"int32","required":null,"key":"mwMbhN"}]}]}

update_log_list.content: update the parameter name from country to region
